author: Lon.TV
description:
See retro reviews of Chromecasts here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIuWRJI1kkEC8dPlRzQfaD7K - 2nd generation Chromecasts all stopped work on March 9 due to an expired security certificate. Expect to see more useful older hardware to meet a similar fate in the near future. Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:28 - Supporter Thank Yous
01:00 - Chromecast Overview
02:27 - The Expiration Problem
02:47 - Demo of Problem
04:02 - The Fix
04:41 - The future: all hardware will have fixed expiration dates
